answers.author: Caitlyn Mitchell
answers.text:
Attatched is an extensive outline of how Portland, OR deals with dogs, particularly in dog parks. 
And here is a link for the outline of New York City rules about dogs, rabies, and public parks
http://www.nycgovparks.org/facilities/dogruns

author: Sarah Smith
text:
We are looking into changing some of our fines and/or fees. If you currently have a Violation process with the following ordinances, can you please respond and explain that process?
Accumulation of Refuse on a property
Accumulation of Dog feces on private property
Dogs at large
Dogs-excessive barking
Dogs-no rabies vaccination
Dogs in public parks
title: Fines/Fees
